roleset.name: reduction, depletion
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: Args 0, 1 and LOC
example.text: And the UK is starting their draw-down of troops in Iraq...soon it'll be just the 140,000 Americans. And 12 Moldovans.

example.name: Arg 0 and DIR
example.text: AUSTRALIA will begin its drawdown from Afghanistan within weeks

example.name: Arg1
example.text: The USN is also attempting to fast - track its Seabasing platforms which theoretically would make - up for the draw - down in legacy amphibious warfare platforms .
